creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: large, pleated skirt with narrow beige waistband and ties, in three horizontal sections; top blue band (6-1/4"); center band (13") of blue and beige geometric batik; lower, colorful (5-1/2") band of embroidery, alternating with red and black rectangles; bottom horizontal border in red and green
dimension:
25 1/4 x 35 in. (64.14 x 88.9 cm)
42 in. (106.68 cm) (object part, ties)
title: Skirt
